name: Air Combat III
description:
The war is over, and the legendary pilot who boarded the XF series have disappeared.
XF-99 is kept under strict security.
The Willsword country, which developed the XF series, has developed the XF-100, which has no fear of security leaks wherever it falls, in order to prevent leakage of security.
When the war is over and peace comes, terrorists will always appear.
The player fights against terrorism as an ace pilot selected to board the XF-100.
Where did the legendary ace pilot disappear?

Feature of this game

This game is a 3D flight shooting arcade game.
The most realistic terrain graphics in the series.
The most realistic weather in the series.
Aerial battle in the clouds.
For the first time in the series, enemy fighters and ground weapons appear simultaneously.
Newly composed music. (Not assets)
10 missions.

Control

ESC: Pause
Mouse: Ascending, descending, turning
Right mouse click: Change weapon
Left mouse click: Shoot weapon
W: Speed up
S: Speed down
A, D: Move the aircraft to the left and right

Xbox controller

Ascending, descending, turning: Left stick
Speed up,Speed down,Move the aircraft to the left and right: Right stick
Change weapon : B
Shoot weapon: A
